alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 8:04AM PST until December 16 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER STORM WARNING IS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 1 PM PST THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two feet, with isolated amounts up to three feet above 5,000 feet. Snow amounts of 6 to 12 inches from 3,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Wind will gust as high as 50 mph on exposed ridgetops and near the crest. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Upper San Joaquin River, Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge and Kings Canyon NP Counties. * WHEN...Valid from 4 PM PST this afternoon until 1 PM PST Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be extremely difficult or nearly impossible. Expect snow covered roads and low visibilities. These hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds may bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, remember to carry tire chains, plenty of food, a good deal of water, warm clothing, and an extra flashlight in your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
